column7: Good food, good price and pleasant dining area
column9: I had lunch with a friend who works in the area.  There are three choices for the daily lunch - "regular", vegetarian and Mediterranean which all cost 80 kr.  The servings are good size and the price includes salad and good, freshly baked bread and...More

column7: One of the best lunch restaurants in Lund, especially the vegetarian alternative
column9: This is an excellent lunch restaurant that serves well cooked food of different styles. Several alternative dishes are offered. I can strongly recommend the vegetarian alternative. Very tasty and the line is shorter than to the other types of food, so you get served fast....More
